body:
On 8 Jan 2008, at 22:57, Fitzsimmons, Rob wrote:
I had a sunpath diagram in my old Blender exporter. The code still
exists but I haven't looked at it in a while. IIRC you could also use
a fisheye image as background (it's the round version with the zenith
at the top, not the one in your image).

I don't think I ever managed PDF output. So all you could create is
a screenshot.


Regards,
Thomas
subject: [Radiance-general] Sun charting program?
